author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda Accelerator
description: Many Cardano fans may want to deploy on Milkomeda, but last the technical knowledge to fully bring their idea to life
solution: We will use our expertise at dcSpark to run an accelerator program for projects interested in building with Milkomeda
experience: Our team created Milkomeda and we have worked in the blockchain ecosystem for many years including ex-EMURGO and ex-IOHK members
